name: SuDs masterclass - an opportunity to enhance urban design
location: This stream will take place in (room to be confirmed)
description: Sustainable Drainage Systems are a vital component of managing water and delivering multiple benefits in our cities. SuDs need to link design, quality, effective performance and ease of maintenance to satisfy clients and developers.

presentations.name: Integrating trees and green infrastructure alongside responsible water
The potential for urban rain-gardens
presentations.speakers: Professor Nigel Dunnett, Professor of Planting Design & Vegetation Technology and Director of the Green Roof Centre, University of Sheffield

presentations.name: SuDs design in an urban context
